label: CelesTrak Starlink GP/CSV
description: Active Starlink elements, orbital parameters, and counts used to understand constellation scale and decay eligibility.

label: CelesTrak SATCAT – Recently Decayed
description: Confirmed decay events, including Starlink entries, used to timestamp and tally re-entries.

label: Vulnerability and advisory feeds (CERT/CC, national CERTs, vendor bulletins)
description: Publicly disclosed vulnerabilities or incidents referencing Starlink user terminals or supporting infrastructure.

label: Astronomical reports and RFI notes
description: Observatory mitigation reports, optical streak surveys, and radio-interference summaries that mention Starlink or similar constellations.

label: Generation mass mix and alumina assumptions
description: Parameters defined in data/starlink_config.yml for satellite mass, aluminum fraction, and alumina conversion used in environmental calculations.
